meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of a long roll filled with meats, cheeses, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed delicious hoagies for lunch.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a hoagie with turkey and Swiss cheese.
meanings.sent3: The hoagies at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: The hoagies were a tower of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked hoagies filled the room.

meanings.sent2: She hoagies her favorite sandwich every Sunday.
meanings.sent3: I hoagies my way through the buffet at the party.
meanings.sent4: He hoagies with enthusiasm at the picnic.
meanings.sent5: Hoagies together with friends make the meal more enjoyable.
